title: Decision Tapestry Log Schema
description: Defines the structure for the decisions.yml file used by Decision Tapestry.

id.description: A unique integer that identifies the decision.

title.description: A concise, imperative-mood title for the decision.

author.description: The person or team who made the decision.

date.description: The timestamp when the decision was accepted, in ISO 8601 format.

status.description: The current state of the decision.

project.description: The project or domain this decision belongs to.

rationale.description: The reasons and context behind why this decision was made.

tradeoffs.description: The alternative options considered and the reasons they were not chosen.

supersedes.description: The ID of a previous decision that this one replaces.

superseded_by.description: The ID of a newer decision that replaces this one.

related_to.description: A list of IDs for other decisions that are related to this one.

affected_components.description: A list of file paths or system components affected by this decision.

tasks.description: A checklist of actionable tasks required to implement the decision.
